name: Match Engine 3 Hunie Pop Like
description:
It supports Game Maker Studio 1 

This is Match 3 Engine with game mechanic similar to Hunie Pop game. Click and drag tiles to create matches of 3 or more. Matching 4 or more tiles will create jewel which is worth more points.

Features:

- Match 3 mechanics

- Pause menu (on system interruption and by pressing pause button)

- Any size board

- Board can be placed anywhere in the room

- Number of colors/jewels can be changed

License information:

You can use this engine to make any number of games either free or commercial.

You can't sell this engine in any form original or modified with the access to source code.
